verses.verse: וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi happened לִתְשׁוּבַ֨ת <S%H8666><s%> lit-shu-Vat was expired הַשָּׁנָ֜ה <S%H8141><s%> hash-sha-Nah And it came to pass after the year לְעֵ֣ת׀ <S%H6256><s%> le-'Et at the time צֵ֣את <S%H3318><s%> tzet go forth הַמַּלְאֿכִ֗ים <S%H4428><s%> ham-malChim, kings וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent דָּוִ֡ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid [to battle] that David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יוֹאָב֩ <S%H3097><s%> yo-'Av Joab וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עֲבָדָ֨יו <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dav and his servants עִמּ֜וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo with וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, with him and all Israel וַיַּשְׁחִ֙תוּ֙ <S%H7843><s%> vai-yash-Chi-tu and they destroyed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon, of Ammon וַיָּצֻ֖רוּ <S%H6696><s%> vai-ya-Tzu-ru and besieged עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and רַבָּ֑ה <S%H7237><s%> rab-Bah; Rabbah וְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> ve-da-Vid But David יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev tarried still בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim. at Jerusalem ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִ֣י׀ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came לְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> le-'Et now when הָעֶ֗רֶב <S%H6153><s%> ha-'E-rev, evening וַיָּ֨קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom arose דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid that David מֵעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from מִשְׁכָּבוֹ֙ <S%H4904><s%> mish-ka-Vo from off his bed וַיִּתְהַלֵּךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> vai-yit-hal-leCh and walked עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on גַּ֣ג <S%H1406><s%> gag upon the roof בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, of the king's וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar he saw אִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah a woman רֹחֶ֖צֶת <S%H7364><s%> ro-Che-tzet washing מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al and from הַגָּ֑ג <S%H1406><s%> hag-Gag; and from the roof וְהָ֣אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> ve-Ha-'ish-Shah, herself and the woman טוֹבַ֥ת <S%H2896><s%> to-Vat beautiful מַרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> mar-'Eh to look upon מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. [was] very

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, And David וַיִּדְרֹ֖שׁ <S%H1875><s%> vai-yid-Rosh and enquired לָֽאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> la-'ish-Shah; after the woman וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, And [one] said הֲלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ha-lo- not זֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> zoT likewise בַּת־ bat- שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H1339><s%> She-va' [Is] not this Bathsheba בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter אֱלִיעָ֔ם <S%H463><s%> 'e-li-'Am, of Eliam אֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet the wife אוּרִיָּ֥ה <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah of Uriah הַחִתִּֽי׃ <S%H2850><s%> ha-chit-Ti. Hittite

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David מַלְאָכִ֜ים <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim messengers וַיִּקָּחֶ֗הָ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-ka-Che-ha, and took וַתָּב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Vo her and she came in אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him וַיִּשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> vai-yish-Kav unto him and he lay עִמָּ֔הּ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mah, with וְהִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hi she מִתְקַדֶּ֖שֶׁת <S%H6942><s%> mit-kad-De-shet with her for she was purified מִטֻּמְאָתָ֑הּ <S%H2932><s%> mit-tum-'a-Tah; from her uncleanness וַתָּ֖שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vat-Ta-shov and she returned אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to her בֵּיתָֽהּ׃ <S%H1004><s%> bei-Tah. unto her house

וַתַּ֖הַר <S%H2029><s%> vat-Ta-har conceived הָֽאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah; And the woman וַתִּשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> vat-tish-Lach and sent וַתַּגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> vat-tag-Ged and told לְדָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid, David וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer and said הָרָ֥ה <S%H2030><s%> ha-Rah I [am] with child אָנֹֽכִי׃ <S%H595><s%> 'a-No-chi. I

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> yo-'Av, to Joab שְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> she-Lach [saying] Send אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֽוּרִיָּ֖ה <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah me Uriah הַחִתִּ֑י <S%H2850><s%> ha-chit-Ti; the Hittite וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent יוֹאָ֛ב <S%H3097><s%> yo-'Av And Joab אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֽוּרִיָּ֖ה <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah Uriah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid. to David

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo was come אוּרִיָּ֖ה <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah And when Uriah אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav; about וַיִּשְׁאַ֣ל <S%H7592><s%> vai-yish-'Al demanded דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, unto him David לִשְׁל֤וֹם <S%H7965><s%> lish-Lom did יוֹאָב֙ <S%H3097><s%> yo-'Av [of him] how Joab וְלִשְׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> ve-lish-Lom did הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, and how the people וְלִשְׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> ve-lish-Lom prospered הַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah. and how the war

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David לְא֣וּרִיָּ֔ה <S%H223><s%> le-'U-ri-Yah, to Uriah רֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> red Go down לְבֵיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> le-vei-te-Cha to thy house וּרְחַ֣ץ <S%H7364><s%> u-re-Chatz and wash רַגְלֶ֑יךָ <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lei-cha; thy feet וַיֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze departed out אֽוּרִיָּה֙ <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah And Uriah מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, of the king's וַתֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> vat-te-Tze was sent אַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav and there followed מַשְׂאַ֥ת <S%H4864><s%> mas-'At him a mess הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech. [of meat] from the king

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> vai-yish-Kav slept אוּרִיָּ֗ה <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah, But Uriah פֶּ֚תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach at the door בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, of the king's אֵ֖ת <S%H854><s%> 'et with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Dei with all the servants אֲדֹנָ֑יו <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nav; of his lord וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and did not יָרַ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> ya-Rad and went not down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To. to his house

וַיַּגִּ֤דוּ <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Gi-du And when they had told לְדָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid David לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not יָרַ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> ya-Rad went not down אוּרִיָּ֖ה <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah Uriah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To; unto his house וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אוּרִיָּ֗ה <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah, unto Uriah הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not מִדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> mid-De-rech along אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you בָ֔א <S%H935><s%> Va, Camest מַדּ֖וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> mad-Du-a' how לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יָרַ֥דְתָּ <S%H3381><s%> ya-Rad-ta down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his בֵּיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1004><s%> bei-Te-cha. house

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אוּרִיָּ֜ה <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah And Uriah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, unto David הָ֠אָרוֹן <S%H727><s%> Ha-'a-ron The ark וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <S%H3478><s%> ve-Yis-ra-'El and Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> vi-hu-Dah and Judah יֹשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vim abide בַּסֻּכּ֗וֹת <S%H5521><s%> bas-suk-Kot, in tents וַאדֹנִ֨י <S%H113><s%> va-do-Ni and my lord יוֹאָ֜ב <S%H3097><s%> yo-'Av Joab וְעַבְדֵ֤י <S%H5650><s%> ve-'av-Dei and the servants אֲדֹנִ֨י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni of my lord עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei in the open הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh fields חֹנִ֔ים <S%H2583><s%> cho-Nim, are encamped וַאֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni shall I אָב֧וֹא <S%H935><s%> a-Vo then go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בֵּיתִ֛י <S%H1004><s%> bei-Ti into mine house לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> le-'e-Chol to eat וְלִשְׁתּ֖וֹת <S%H8354><s%> ve-lish-Tot and to drink וְלִשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> ve-lish-Kav and to lie עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אִשְׁתִּ֑י <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Ti; ess חַיֶּ֙ךָ֙ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Ye-cha liveth וְחֵ֣י <S%H2416><s%> ve-Chei and the life נַפְשֶׁ֔ךָ <S%H5315><s%> naf-She-cha, and [as] thy soul אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- I will not אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-Seh I will not do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אוּרִיָּ֗ה <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah, to Uriah שֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> shev Tarry בָּזֶ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> ba-Zeh here גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom here to day וּמָחָ֣ר <S%H4279><s%> u-ma-Char also and to morrow אֲשַׁלְּחֶ֑ךָּ <S%H7971><s%> 'a-shal-le-Che-ka; I will let thee depart וַיֵּ֨שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev abode אוּרִיָּ֧ה <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah So Uriah בִירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> vi-ru-sha-Lim in Jerusalem בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he וּמִֽמָּחֳרָֽת׃ <S%H4283><s%> u-Mi-mo-cho-Rat. and the morrow

וַיִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-ra- had called ל֣וֹ lo דָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, And when David וַיֹּ֧אכַל <S%H398><s%> vai-Yo-chal him he did eat לְפָנָ֛יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav before וַיֵּ֖שְׁתְּ <S%H8354><s%> vai-Ye-shet and drink וַֽיְשַׁכְּרֵ֑הוּ <S%H7937><s%> vay-shak-ke-Re-hu; him and he made him drunk וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze he went out בָעֶ֗רֶב <S%H6153><s%> va-'E-rev, and at even לִשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> lish-Kav to lie בְּמִשְׁכָּבוֹ֙ <S%H4904><s%> be-mish-ka-Vo on his bed עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Dei with the servants אֲדֹנָ֔יו <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nav, of his lord וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- to his בֵּית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To to his house לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not יָרָֽד׃ <S%H3381><s%> ya-Rad. but went not down

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become בַבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> vab-Bo-ker, And it came to pass in the morning וַיִּכְתֹּ֥ב <S%H3789><s%> vai-yich-To wrote דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid that David סֵ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer a letter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יוֹאָ֑ב <S%H3097><s%> yo-'Av; to Joab וַיִּשְׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach and sent בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad [it] by the hand אוּרִיָּֽה׃ <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah. of Uriah
